review: One of the best interfaces I have come across. But when you consider the functionality with the price point, lot of other apps beat this one by a good margin. Either bring the price down or introduce enough features to distinguish yourself to justify the price. Edit: I do hope you will add the option to enable/disable north star, goals and habits. I use just the goals feature right now, so disabling the others would be convenient.
ras4vb: Hey thanks for the kind words. Yes we are actively working on the improvement. Unlike many other apps that haven't been updated for years, we ship surprise every month to delight our customers. We'll also adjust the price based on currency to be more accessible. We are studying the right prices.

review: I've enjoyed using the interface of higher goals, but feel it could use more customization, like instead of circles for habits maybe a simple downwards list that can be ticked off, this would keep easier to look at and more orderly in priorities. Also a journal component would be amazing, if we could write about our plans and goals, in a journal on the app that would be fantastic. Another great to add could be a Monday to Sunday timetable, so time could be scheduled for habits and activities.

Exactly what I was looking for! I wanted something that could track daily, weekly (1x or multiple times per week), and monthly habits as well as annual goals. Most apps don't track monthly tasks or if they do then the task is due on a certain day that month instead of getting it done within that month. This app has what I wants and also keeps track of annual goals and % complete! A bar fills up to show that I have read 3 of 30 books this year, for instance.
ras4vb: Thank you, Amber. How you use the app inspires us and you explained it better than we could. Indeed, habits are weekly goals, north stars are life goals, and other goals fall in the middle. We are glad that we are the first app that sees this fact and let people track all of them in one place. We wish you a great 2020!

review: Spent a really long time searching for an app that would tie my habits to an overarching goal & love that I've finally found a great app that does exactly that! I only just set the app up, but so far it seems great and is easy to use. There seems to be a minor bug where if I'm creating a habit, and I still have the text box of describing the habit selected, I can't save the habit. I just keep getting a pop up saying "describe your habit", even though the text box is filled in,but still selected

This app fits for me. But there is problem. It seems there's a slight bug in the app. So, when I switch from this application to another application (multitasking) and then switch to this application again, the app suddenly crashes and cannot be moved at all (not because my phone is lagging). why? Hopefully you will quickly fix it. I'll add two stars later.

I love the IDEA of the app, but it's execution is terrible. When logging progress, the numbers entered will often disappear. It will initially show your progress, but then you can watch it as the number disappears and reverts back to the previous number. This fatal bug makes app almost entirely useless. I hope this is fixed but for now, ive lost too much progress to continue relying on this app. Hopefully this will be fixed because I really do love the design.

Love this app, the UI is gorgeous and easy to use and the goal features and check-in works well. It would be nice to be able to change the tracking units and frequency. At the moment you can only add 'times' per day/week/month, but I would like the option to have hours, minutes, and other goals. And to be able to set specific days would be a useful feature.
ras4vb: Hi thanks for the kind feedback. Could you send us a few examples of habit/goals you'd like to track to terry@mindfulsuite.com? The UI won't be able to predict how to calculate the analytics for all custom units. So specific examples would help us bring it to you! Thanks!

review: When I posted a frustrated review I got a great response. So I tried the app. I love it! Simple and customizable, the developers let me decide what constitutes success and track in measures and frequencies of my choosing. I love filling the bars in and my "North Star" kept in view. Beautiful colors & graphics too. NOTE: I was annoyed that I couldn't find cost information. It is buried in your profile after clicking upgrade. Should be in upfront in app description or, at least, in FAQs
ras4vb: Hi Laura, the app is free to use for up to 8 habits and 20 goals in the upcoming version. No ads whatsoever. Pro subscription is $3.99/mo, $19.99/year, or $39.99/one time. Sorry about the confusion and frustration. Have a nice day and we wish you the best luck with your goals. üôè  Update: thank you for the kind words! Much love ‚ù§Ô∏è

review: This habit and goal setting app is pretty amazing already and still has great potential! I really like the design. Compared to dull and too statistical looking apps like Habitfy, this app is way better. I feel some things are maybe still missing to make the app perfect. Suggestions: Add a skip function, add change the background picture for the top 'Good Evening' section. Clean up the calendar, maybe only having the tasks/habits/events. Also a sync function with other devices (smart watch,pc)
ras4vb: Hi there, thanks for the kind words and helpful feedback on what we can improve. We totally agree. Web version is coming this month and the calendar needs a supercharge. We'll keep innovate to make this even more actionable and motivational.

review: I have looked at multiple goal/vision apps and this one is the simplest to use. Mainly because I like that you aren't forced to upload a photo like a lot of other apps do, and it breaks things down into vision (North star), goals and habits. I would love it if you had a widget so there is a visual reminder of your goal without going into the app. Would also be great if there were more stock photos available to use.

There's a lot to love about this app, and I hope it continues to be developed. But there are also things which need to be fixed (on my phone, at least). For instance, it freezes up and becomes unresponsive every few minutes, and needs to be restarted. The rotating banner takes up too much space (that could be better used showing more goals). Some of the text/numbers on some screens gets cut-off. Sometimes when you're editing a parameter, it doesn't save/stick. Finally, the price perhaps too high. But even with flaws, it's still a solid four out of five. Great work!

The best goals and habits app IMO. Better than habitica and the others. I needed something simple but with a easy to use UI. It needs more features however. Like family goal, habit and todo list. This could grow into that. That said, the price doesn't justify the features. If they added the a family section and it could be used across multiple devices then I could see the price being justified.

The app is great. Has Dream Goals/Mindset reminder at top. Also its clear and easy to use. Very user friendly. Very visual. I was thinking maybe a vision board could be added at the top scroll bar as visuals communicate better with the subconscious mind and creates an imprint of future self. Also when the goals deadlines goes to a certain percentage eg. 5 days left out of 20 days (25%) they could change colour to alert you when it's critical. Eg. Green, orange 25%, red 10% or it could flash.

This app really is great! It has a simple but well designed concept, is easy to use and perfectly helps you keep track of your goals and habits. It totally kept, what it promised. I wrote to their support because of a minor issue and they replied so fast and were really helpful, which made me love their app even more! I can definitely recommend this app!! Only suggestion right now: if I mark a certain habit a done for today or for a week or month, it shouldn't remind me anymore about it.

This app is incredibly well researched and thought out. It has a minimalist design that guides you through setting up your goals in life, and it feels rewarding to use. I'm looking forward to even more features. I will say that I'm waiting on widgets to see if I give it five stars. I keep a clear home screen for high priority tools and this would definitely be one. I recommend giving this app a try and being patient as they roll out more features. The lifetime price is steep but I see potential.

I'm using the free trial right now and really love the app. Beautiful and simple layout. I am considering the premium but would like to know if a widget is included - I'd love to be able to add a list of habits and goals, with a translucent background, to my phone screen. Helps with motivation.
ras4vb: Hi Jennifer, thank you for the review. Could you send an example of widgets you like to terry@mindfulsuite.com? We typically add features suggested by our customers in 1 - 4 weeks, depending on how complex the solution is. Thank you and have a great 2020!

review: The best app for tracking goals to me, and I tried to choose from many. Love the concept and minimalist design, fits perfectly to my self improvement ideas:) It would be nice to have built-in timer with some habits to set and track time daily (e.g. do for an hour daily). The rest of features is perfect to me:) Thank you to the developers, really great app!
ras4vb: Thanks for the kind words. Great suggestion we'll add that to our feature list for July. Cheers!

review: Even with a paid subscription, the features remain locked most of the time. I have tried reinstalling this app three times already. What makes it worse is that the "I have problems" button doesn't even work. I cannot even report the problem nor contact support.

There's no way to delete a goal if it become obsolete, and when I signed in it completely wiped all my data. I had been using the app not signed in for months without realizing it, signed in and all my in progress goals were replaced with some that were associated with my account. Terrible user experience. User should get a warning this would happen, or better yet merge the goals set up in guest account with the user account upon sign in.

This app is great however it would be really helpful to have like a one week visual over view of what we have set for days through the week or is it is possible just add it onto the page where you have already provided us with a calender. It would be very helpful to help ke keep track of all the things I use your app to schedule.
ras4vb: great suggestion. Will be redesigned and updated

review: I was using loop habits earlier, last month I switched to this since I was looking for something which will work on iPhone and Android. This is really a good app, nice easy to manage and visualization is decent. I suggest the development team to add an option to maintain or modify separate notification tone / alert than using the standard notification. Many a times I missed the reminder thinking that it s a SMS or WA message than the reminder of Goals.

It's a good app but I can't rearrange my goals. Once it is create, it just stays there. I want too see the goal I want to finish first in top. Also, I can't delete the goals. Once it is made, it's permanent.

Really good UI. But everything is oversized, only 2 habits and 2 goals can be seen in the main page. (Without swiping). I suggest a more condensed view option, as it would help people who like to track a lot of things.
ras4vb: Thanks Peter for the kind review. Our intention was to reduce the information density so it's more pleasant to our brains. As we add more themes, we'll add a compact view to display less info per item to fit more items on one screen but it'll be hard to fit all without scrolling. We hope the desktop/web version will make reviewing easier. üôèüí™

review: This app has alot of potential. The way it categorizes habits, goals and inspirations is cool and makes u want to use it's functions; but keeping track of these personal aspirations is hard to do for free since they only give u three colors to choose from and many other functions are locked behind upgrading. I wanted to jot down and track my progress towards goals. This app will only help u if u pay. I wouldn't mind paying for the help, but not how this app unjustly limits you. Look elsewhere.
ras4vb: Your feedback is very valuable. Please email us and we'll adjust the free features.

review: Definitely an amazing option with great UI. But after upgrading to Pro, it feels like it isn't providing enough for the value. Specially if you consider the calander section, There are no insights or trackes you can have... just some basic logs which are not at all user friendly. I would suggest the developers to improve in that area
The ap stopped working. I reinstalled it and was going to start over. I already paid the one time fee, but the ap won't give me the upgraded options. I have emailed and have not received a reply.

This is a life changing app. It gives gentle reminders about your ultimate goal in life, as well as your mindsets, goals and habits. It motivates you so much. The UI is amazing, and the pic capture after achieving your daily habits makes you feel proud about how you are turning into a better version of yourself. This is the best productivity app ever!

In love with the app, beautiful design and help you keep with your goals. One of my fav feat is definitely the steps/checklist, and it feels great when you see the graph showing progress. The only downside is that i would love to buy the app premium but is $40

This app is so good having classy & stylish look.I found a way better than other apps , but only thing is that you can set upto only 3 goals and 3 habits without having premium membership . Which which somehow less for the use of a student to set up subjects and exams as goals and to track revision . You can't find a checkbox Note for daily task, You can set upto 3 habits .More upgradation would be appreciated üòä
ras4vb: Once you sign up you can manage 8 habits and 20 goals üòÅ

review: I was skeptical at first because the app previews seems like a typical goal tracker but with pictures. The good reviews made me dive in. It's cool, the app gives a different vibes of tracking not only your goals but habits, purpose and mindset in life. A suggestion would be that completion of goals are not always set by date, for instance, If wanted to get 100 Pushups as my goal, I of course want to set the conditions of completing the goal into 100 counts but the app only gives u date.

Beautiful App That Makes You Want To Stayed Committed To Your Goals I really like the photo check in-- that's a great plus! I'd love to also see a place in the Goals side, its own northstar/manifesto and/or reminders why you're committing to that goals. Even a place to upload a picture...so that I feel more mindful why I'm going after that goal in the first place. Thanks!
ras4vb: Thanks for the review and good idea. We are planning to introduce custom inspiration photos so you can create a vision board.

review: This app looks good and has a good range of features but is quite buggy. Marking habits as done from the calendar menu often fails to toggle the check mark on. Also, when updating the numbers on goals, the change isn't applied until I force close the app and reopen.
ras4vb: Hi Daniel, sorry that you are affected by bugs. Thank you very much for providing helpful details. We've noticed this issue happening when the app is in the background for a while. We found the root cause. Apologies for the frustration it has caused! Update: a new version is released that should have solved this!

review: Awesome UI & concept. A bit limiting on the free version, but gives a good idea of what to expect with premium. I want to buy lifetime but the price is a bit steep for being a fairly new app - I want the devs to succeed, but have purchased quite a few higher-priced lifetime apps that get abandoned when they don't gain traction. Will watch and see as the app and userbase grows, and will purchase lifetime then (or before then if lifetime is ever on sale for about 50% off)
ras4vb: Thank you Drew for your kind words and taking the time to write feedback. We agree that a lifetime membership is an investment that should be honored and protected. While we can't speak for other companies, we are cutting no corners on delivering the most beautiful UX and quality services because human dreams are the most exicting things to us.

review: This is looks really promising app. Stepwise planning a d achievement can be track and record. I don't mind subscribing it for longer time. But at start itself it is asking login with email address. Due to this I don't want to go for it. If this step can be skip I can try & subscribe. But right now I can't do that. Hence, have to uninstall.
ras4vb: Thanks for the review. We've added the ability to use the tracker without logging in as of June 22nd, 2020.

review: Loved it!!! Very clean app and ui friendly. Can you link habits and goals. Because few goals require different habits to be consolidated like for example, goal: getting into shape, requires habits like pushups pullups and other excercises. So it would be nice if habit was also under goals or something close to that.
ras4vb: Tthanks for the review! This is a good suggestion and will be useful, and it's actually one of our long term goals. We are thinking hard on how to make this easy to setup without making the logic too complex for you.

review: Very simple, not gonna lie I was expecting more. No widgets, no notification bar options. Depends on your goals how efficient this app can be. If you are good at tracking your goals yes this is good but if you are building a new goal and you are bad at this. This is not your thing.
ras4vb: Thank you for the honest feedback. We will improve on these areas.

review: Beautiful app. I genuinely use this every day and have recommended to everyone I know. Keep track of goals, habits and targets seamlessly. It's so motivational seeing progress and the layout is so relaxing and zen. I love it.

Brilliant app for setting and achieving my most precious goals. It has got really good user experience. The only issue i found was on some screens i did not know where to tap to change some parameters. But overall a good experience
ras4vb: Thank you for the kind feedback. We' ll add instructions on how the screens work

review: I have really enjoyed this app. During this time of COVID-19 and creating healthy daily routines to keep me sane it has been the tool I have used the most. It helps me stay motivated, it is easy to use, and they are really prompt in replying when you offer feedback.
ras4vb: Thank you for the kind review. Really honored to be helping people stay productive now and beyond the covid.

review: So sick of apps that make absolutely no mention of the fact that all these wonderful things you offer in the app description are only available to premium users, then after we have signed up and you have our details, the app is useless without premium. There is not even a way to delete my account once I set it up. I have sent am email asking my account to be deleted.
ras4vb: Hi Robert, since we haven't heard back from you after 24 hours, we have proceeded to delete your account. We appreciate your feedback and we will make the app more useful beyond top 3 goals and top 3 habits for all free users. Sorry that it didn't meet your expectations and we wish you a successful 2020!
